org.eodisp.ui.mm.resources
Class MmResources

java.lang.Object
  org.eodisp.ui.mm.resources.MmResources

public class MmResources
extends java.lang.Object

This class is to support resources needed in the GUI interface. Resources can be of any type (e.g. strings, music, images, etc). This class will support the load of such resources.

A special type of resources are the localized strings. These are kept in a ResourceBundle. This can be used to return a localized string, depending on the current user locale. The default language is English (ISO Code 'en').

Currently, the following types of resources are supported:

  • Icons: Icons used in the model manager application (see getIcon(String)
  • UIMessageString: Strings displayed to an user of the graphical user interface (see getMessage(String))

Author:
eglimi

Method Detail

getIcon

public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getIcon(java.lang.String path)
This returns the icon with the given name. It will only search for the icon in the 'icons' folder contained within this folder.

Parameters:
iconName - The name of the icon.
Returns:
The icon if found, otherwise null.

getAppImage

public static java.awt.Image getAppImage()
Returns the application icon. Uses Class.getResource(String), which uses the current class loader.

Returns:
the application icon.

getMessage

public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String key)
Returns the text found by the given key in the resource. Only Strings which are used in a EODiSP user interface are returned here.

Parameters:
key - The resource file is searched for this key.
Returns:
The text for the current language or a fallback language if no string can be found.
